dublin_core.dcvalue: Dolorosa Duncan, Regional Manager, Pathfinder International, Email: dduncan@pathfinder.org; Lucy Fulgence, Country Director Tanzania, D-tree International, Email: lfulgence@d-tree.org
Five districts in Shinyanga Region, Tanzania

Through this mobile application, health workers in Tanzania go through a well-defined protocol to educate their clients about all available family planning methods and draw on the clients' fertility intentions and personal preferences to support clients to choose the method most appropriate for their needs.
